import Nav from './nav'; import axios from 'axios'; import React, {useState,useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; export default function Dashboard() { var paid=0 var unpaid=0 const [users,setUsers]=useState([]) useEffect(() => { axios.get('http://localhost:4242/users/') .then(res => { setUsers( res.data ); }) .catch((error) => { console.log(error); }) paid=users.filter(item=>{ if(item.status=='paid'){ return true } return false }).length; }, []) console.log(users) return <>
